name: Oneshot (itch) (cocosar07)
description:
A game made with HaxeFlixel for the GMTK Game Jam 2019 in 48 hours. The theme was "only one".

You have two moves in this game: walk for a short distance, or attack with a dash. You have only one attack, unless your attack successfully hit something.

Controls:

  • Simple clic: move for a short distance in the direction you clicked (think of a roll, without the animation)
  • Clic and hold, move the mouse to choose a direction and release: attack
  • +/- to control volume

Tips:

  • Take your time when you choose a direction to attack.
  • You can start an attack while moving.
